about_the_game:
Stellar Checkpoint is a document-checking simulation game set in space. We don't care if you are a human, a robot, or an alien as long as you have proper documentation! And don't carry illegal items in your luggage… Or inside you. Each day, the rules will be explained to you, so pay attention and…

Just don't question anything.

Check Each Alien Thoroughly

You decide who enters Earth and who gets… taken care of. Aliens will often try to sneak in, forge documents, and maybe even bribe you, but we fully trust you will do the right thing. And we are always watching, so there's that.

Uncover Secrets

Not everything is what it seems, and not every alien is trying to trick you. You might think your superior wants the best for you, but the truth is not as straightforward. Make your own decisions, discover the secrets of your spaceship, or deal with the consequences and uncertainty.

Key Features

  • Check documents, luggage, and even the aliens themselves to make sure they comply with the rules.
  • Speaking of rules, they change constantly, like, daily, so you must pay attention!
  • Multiple endings depending on what you decide to do, or not do.
  • Almost 100% diegetic UI.
  • Collectable trophies to showcase your achievements.
  • Minigames to keep your mind in great shape.
  • VR supported, though not required.
  • Twitch integration.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Celeron® 4205U or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 610 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
  • Additional Notes: AMD/ATI pre GCN 4th gen cards not supported. Full OpenGL 3.3 support required. VR will probably nor work on systems with minimum requirements.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
  • Additional Notes: AMD/ATI pre GCN 4th gen cards not supported. Full OpenGL 3.3 support required.

short_description: Inspect alien documents as Earth's first interstellar border agent. Verify passports, detect forgeries, and make crucial decisions that impact human-alien relations. Can you keep Earth safe while navigating complex intergalactic regulations?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
